text_1_facilitator.eng: **ParentApp supports you to take care of yourself.**

text_2.eng:
We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent! 

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our children.

rows.text_1_facilitator: **ParentApp supports you to take care of yourself.**
rows.text_2:
We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent! 

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our children.

rows.text_1: Why is my wellbeing important to my child?

text_1.eng: Why is my wellbeing important to my child?

text_1_facilitator.eng: Great question. Caring for others starts with caring for yourself.

section_1_title.eng: Remember that you cannot pour from an empty cup.

section_1_extra_text.eng: If your own cup is empty, you won’t have anything to pour into your child’s cup. Take care of yourself, so you can take care of your child.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Great question. Caring for others starts with caring for yourself.
rows.section_1_title: Remember that you cannot pour from an empty cup.
rows.section_1_extra_text: If your own cup is empty, you won’t have anything to pour into your child’s cup. Take care of yourself, so you can take care of your child.

rows.text_1: Every week, ParentApp will support you to take a pause, relax, and look after yourself.

text_1.eng: Every week, ParentApp will support you to take a pause, relax, and look after yourself.
